name: Flap'Plane
description:
Flap'Plane You play characters flying in the sky while avoiding obstacles.

The game consists of dodging obstacles and going as far as possible in the level by popping balloons.
The more you advance in the level the more the difficulty increases.

In addition, this game offers you several exclusive customization options such as:
-The possibility of changing the background of the game (space, jungle, ...)
-Unpublished and original costumes (paper airplane, ghost, ...)
This kind of functionality is unlocked with the number of balloons burst throughout your games.

Flap'Plane
